info.title: CourtListener REST API
info.description: The CourtListener REST API provides access to a comprehensive database of legal documents, case law, judges, oral arguments, and citation lookups. This API supports advanced search capabilities, rate limiting, and token-based authentication.

tags.name: Search
tags.description: Universal search across all content types with advanced operators

tags.name: Case Law
tags.description: Access to legal opinions, clusters, and dockets

tags.name: Judges
tags.description: Judge profiles, positions, and biographical information

tags.name: Oral Arguments
tags.description: Audio recordings and transcripts of oral arguments

get.description: Returns a JSON object with all available API endpoints and their descriptions

Search across all content types including opinions, oral arguments, people, and RECAP documents. Supports advanced query operators including AND, OR, NOT, quotes, wildcards, fuzzy search (~), and field-specific searches.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query with support for advanced operators and field-specific searches (caseName:, court_id:, dateFiled:, etc.)

post.description: Look up citations by providing either a text blob containing citations or specific volume/reporter/page parameters. Rate limited to 60 citations per minute with a maximum of 250 citations per request.

next.description: URL for next page of results

previous.description: URL for previous page of results

citeCount.description: Number of times this case has been cited

cites.description: IDs of cases cited in this opinion

download_url.description: URL to download the opinion document

joined_by_ids.description: IDs of judges who joined this opinion

per_curiam.description: Whether this is a per curiam opinion

text.description: Text blob containing citations to look up

per_curiam.description: Whether this is a per curiam opinion

has_oral_argument_scraper.description: Whether court has oral argument scraper

jurisdiction.description: Jurisdiction type: F=Federal, S=State, FS=Federal Special, MA=Military Appeals

sha1.description: SHA1 hash of the audio file

is_amended.description: Whether this is an amended disclosure

rate.description: Alert frequency: rt=Real Time, dly=Daily, wly=Weekly, mly=Monthly, off=Off

alert_type.description: Type of alert: o=Opinions, oa=Oral Arguments

is_free_on_pacer.description: Whether document is free on PACER

alert_type.description: Type of alert: o=Opinions, oa=Oral Arguments

gross_value_method.description: Method used to determine gross value
Method used to determine gross value

voice_vote.description: Whether it was a voice vote
